name: Father Papi
description:
when Jehovah's turned many of Papi's devoted church goers into one of them, all he could do was seek revenge with his Christian children and god himself. With the arrow keys or A & D collect three bibles so god would only send the Jehovah's to their grave while punching them to hell.

please play the game on Fullscreen 

why doesn't the cutscene work?, itch.io does not support the file format that it is in on Unity nor any option on Unity. it does work on other builds however this is a common issue.
